query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS firebase_push_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(100),
  device_token_id INT,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  data TEXT,
  alert_type ENUM('iot_alert', 'spc_alert', 'cpk_alert', 'escalation_alert', 'system', 'test') NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'delivered', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  message_id VARCHAR(255),
  error_message TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT,
  delivered_at BIGINT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_push_history_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_push_history_status (status),
  INDEX idx_push_history_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_push_history_created (created_at)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(100),
  device_token_id INT,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'delivered', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  message_id VARCHAR(255),
  error_message TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT,
  delivered_at BIGINT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_push_history_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_push_history_status (status),
  INDEX idx_push_history_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_push_history_created (created_at)
);
